Metadata.Title: CVE-2014-10402 affecting package perl-DBI for versions less than 1.632-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2014-10402 affecting package perl-DBI for versions less than 1.632-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package perl-DBI is earlier than 1.632-1, affected by CVE-2014-10402
